review: So far so good with Amazon fire TV.It took me about 10 minutes to hook up and I found installation to be simple (as long as you have an HDMI cable handy.  I also opted to use an ethernet cable to plug directly into my modem instead of going with wifi).The "box" is actually smaller than I thought it would be which was a nice surprise.The app offerings are what I was looking for (Pandora, HuluPlus, NetFlix) and the Prime content with the free 30 day prime trial seems to be pretty good.The voice activated remote really does work and I find the remote to be very intuitive and easy to use.I'd recommend this product if you are looking for a solid device to stream shows, movies, and music.
